COMMODITIES TODAY IN WASHINGTON FOR APRIL 8

House Agriculture Livestock, Dairy and Poultry Subcommittee reviews Agriculture Department's meat inspection program. (1000) -- Agriculture Department releases weekly world production and trade report. (1500) -- Agriculture Department releases survey on agricultural resources. (1500) Reuter
